input_text:
Job Title: Sales Specialist

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
The Sales Specialist is also internally referred to as an Acquisition Manager. This person has a “Whatever-It-Takes” attitude and is willing to go above-and-beyond. The manager is willing to hustle and understand that his/her take-home-pay is based on performance. The Acquisition Manager has experience working on the phones, whether this experience is from real-estate sales or another type of phone sales. This is a long-term position with a large potential for growth. You have the opportunity to work with a dynamic team in an environment that challenges you to grow both personally and professionally. This is your chance to earn what you deserve, with no ceiling on your income.
Why is this role important? The sellers who work with us have a variety of difficult circumstances they are going through and they are needing a empathetic person to be able to understand and better articulate their current problem so that we can help craft a solution that helps this homeowner truly reach their desired end state. This is usually accomplished by selling their property to us, but we have other routes as well. So truly understanding the customers needs is crucial. You will need to focus on building trust and vulnerability because many of the people we help are needing assistant getting out of some of the lowest points in their life including, loss of loved ones, messy divorces, foreclosures, needing to move into assisted living or closer to family, and much more.
What does the role entail?Prospecting:• Networking, cold-calling, and related follow-up with the overall objective of generatingacquisition sales (Dials, and time on dials as KPIS)• Prospecting for motivated sellers; The scope of work shall include, but not limited to:Networking, social media activity, foreclosures, MLS Leads, Delinquents, Vacant, Probate list,Pre-Auction List (KPI- 1 self generated appointment per month)
Acquisition Sales:• All Actions Related to Property Acquisitions Sales Process• Attend scheduled appointments to make a cash offer• Refer prospects for listings post appointment. (2 referrals per week)• When needed call prospects to further qualify seller motivation.• Running comparable values;• Meeting with Sellers as deemed needed;• Processing and submission of all required paperwork; (95% of files submitted complete)• Any and all other measures required to acquire properties (which shall be modified based uponacquisition method utilized).
What results is this role responsible for? $90,000 in projected revenue contracted month over monthComplete 75%+ of your pre-set appointmentsSelf-generate 5-7 appointments per weekMaintain a 20% closing rate
Requirements: NO real estate license is needed! 2+ years of sales experience REQUIREDPhone/virtual sales experience preferred but not required
Compensation: This is a hybrid pay structure of a base salary and a tiered commission structureCommissions are uncapped

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Sales Specialist
output_json.summary: A Sales Specialist with a 'Whatever-It-Takes' attitude is sought after for a full-time position with opportunities for growth.
job_responsibilities: Networking, cold-calling, and follow-up to generate acquisition sales
Prospecting for motivated sellers through various methods
Attending appointments to make cash offers
Acquiring properties based on the chosen method

other.content: 2+ years of sales experience required, phone/virtual sales experience preferred.
Hybrid pay structure of a base salary and uncapped commission.
